abstract: Om Malik, the longtime journalist who founded the technology blog GigaOM, has become a partner in True Ventures, the venture capital firm that backed his company. He said he will continue to write for GigaOM but minimize conflicts between his journalist and investor roles.

lead_paragraph: UPDATED 1:12 p.m. with comment from Lee Wilkins, a professor of journalism ethics.

headline.main: Tech Blogger Om Malik Becomes Venture Partner
